pages.text: A sinister $(l:miskatonicmysteries:rites/rite_intro#triggered_rite)$(t:->Triggered Rites)$(marked)triggered Rite$() used as protection or trap. $(br)By creating a modified form of a Warp Point held under tension, one can allow creatures from the Otherwhere to enter the realm once a soul passes near, or if the rite is forcefully activated. In short, when a living being passes by the Octagram, it will spawn forth a group of otherworldly horrors.
